Dating: CHRISTIAN PERIOD (not before); CHRISTIAN PERIOD; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Bowl
Description: Bowl with wide mouth and stable flat-bottomed base. Paste of an orangey colour. Interior and exterior surfaces with reddish coating. The exterior surface presents, on top of the coating, a painted decoration consisting of bands in black and orangey colours; while the interior also has a painted decoration, here consisting of dark lines which encircle the entire piece.
